title: First Denial  Then Fear  Covid   Patients in Their Own Words
description: People infected with the coronavirus try to cope as the crisis accelerates  The professionals taking care of them are quickly becoming overwhelmed
content: Boy  was I wrong  On Thursday afternoon evening  I developed a nasty cough  replete with heavy chest congestion  This continued into Friday  which is when my fever returned      I called my internist on Friday       The physicians assistant I spoke with    chars
